group_1.textLeft: All you damn people want is answers...

group_1.narration: I knew what Hanna was trying to do.
What I didn't understand was why.
I try to think, but nothing comes together.@I hate this, I hate this, I don't want to lose Hanna...@That's all I can think about.
Stay with me.
If that's not possible,@take me with you.
Isn't it sad to be by yourself?
I'm begging you,@please don't leave me alone.

group_1.textLeft: Welp... Now's as good a time as ever...

group_1.narration: Hanna shattered her own Soul Gem.
Ahh, it's gone...
Right before my eyes,@I lost the one thing I didn't want to lose...

group_1.textLeft: Haha... What a joke it was...

group_1.narration: It felt like I was being pulled by a strong force,@falling into a dark abyss.
For a moment, I wonderedー where am I?
That question disappeared@as quickly as it came.@It didn't matter, after all.
It doesn't matter where I am or@what's happening anymore.
Hanna...
...Something is rising up in me,@rumbling, nauseating, and hot...
It's hatred.
Yes, I should hate. I should hate this world@that stole Hanna from me, this world@that truly holds nothing but sorrow.
I will destroy it.
I couldn't ruin anything in the end,@so all that awaited me was sadness.
I will destroy everything.
No matter how this system works.@No matter how much it resists.@I will use all my strength to overcome it@and break it to little tiny pieces.
I will never forgive it.
ーMikotoー@A warm light broke through,@and my surroundings began glittering.
ーMikotoー@There were innumerable shards of broken mirrors@floating around me, reflecting and glowing.
ーMikotoー@I recognized this sight.
ーMikotoー@Yes. It was from just before I reunited with Hanna.
ーMikotoー@Light had been shining and glittering just like this...
ーMikotoー@My memories of Hanna were spread all around me.
ーMikotoー@I reached out my hand.
ーMikotoー@I didn't care if it was just a memory or an illusion.@I didn't care if Hanna wasn't really there.
ーMikotoー@I just wanted to see her again.

group_1.textRight: It's good to finally see you again, Sena.
What's the matter?@I shouldn't have come?

group_1.textLeft: I don't care if this is a dream or a vision.@I'm just so happy to see you again...!
Did you come to get me?

group_1.textRight: ...Nah. I'm just here to talk to you@about the plan.

group_1.textLeft: The plan...you mean the one you were making@all those preparations for?
It doesn't matter anymore...@It all failed in the end.

group_1.textRight: Ahaha, damn, that's harsh!@I'm telling you, it didn't fail.
I didn't get to finish it completely...@But it's close enough.
So...you remember that date? On that night,@from that highest observation deck...
Take a look at the city.
You'll see everything I have to say.

group_1.textLeft: I...I don't care about that.@Just take me with you.

group_1.textRight: I can't take you with me.@You're staying here.
I'll take on the burden for all our sins.

group_1.textLeft: You'll satisfy no one but yourself this way!@What's the point?!

group_1.textRight: The fact that you're still alive gives me hope.
I'm not asking you to forget what happened...@I just want you to say goodbye to your hate.
To live anew...as someone different from before.
People all around the world are gonna celebrate@your new life.
You're here...and you're allowed to be here.

group_1.narration: I would never be happy without Hanna.
I then found myself at an observation deck.
I had dreamt a nostalgic dream...@A dream of those irreplaceable days@I spent with Hanna.
But I'm no longer with her,@and I've changed hosts since then, and now...
This is my new host.
She's different from Hanna,@but I feel like we might get along...
My voice can't reach her...but it makes sense.@Hanna was special to me, after all,@and that instance was a miracle itself.
Despite that, I can still hear my host's voice@and see the world through her eyes.
She came up to this observation deck@to see what was going on with all@the magical reactions occurring@throughout the city.
...Well, I don't care about@what happens here anymore.
Hanna is gone.
And...she's nowhere to be found@in this world.
Without Hanna,@everything is as dark as night...
Why am I still alive?
What's the point in me staying here?@I'd rather just disappear...
...And that's when I remembered.
Today was the big day of Hanna's plan.
Why was she making suggestions to so@many people to turn off their lights...?
Upon seeing the town that night,@my host gave an abrupt shout.@I could hear the sound of other people@around her making a fuss as well.
I...I had no words.@All I could do was stare at what lay before me,@my head filled with pure emptiness...
I looked upon the city,@where the lights created a message,@"HAPPY BIRTHDAY",@in celebration of someone's birth.
Who would do this, and why?@Was this a birthday gift for someone so blessed?
But then I realized...@that building...and that building, too...@All of these places were ones we had visited...@Where we'd laid suggestions...
Hanna...was this what you were making@preparations for all this time?
...Are you telling me I can be reborn...?
―Alina―@A human being dies, but scatters@her life and makes it shine...
―Alina―@Bello... Bellissimo...
Indeed, it was a beautiful sight.
It showed the brilliance of life to the absurd...
And more than anything...
In this city I hated so much...@it suddenly looked like the whole world@was celebrating me.
It was like the world recognized@my existence for the first time.
But...what now?@What am I supposed to do,@seeing something like this?
Do I just change my mind@and begin anew like Hanna said?
Today, in this moment,@I was born blessed by the world...@Will I live my life, then,@in defiance of despair?
I can't do that!@There's no point...in showing me@something like this...
Yes, it's pointless...
I know that...but...
Why am I...so happy...?
I'm happy...@So happy, I can't stop crying...
I've wanted this for so long...@But I thought I would never get it...
This was Hanna's gift to me...
I know she would have wanted me@to live a different life.
But...there's no changing things now.
My hatred is still there…
I can't forgive a world@that made Hanna disappear.
I'll never be able to change what I am now.
But I will always remember this scene...
I already know I'll remember it every time@I commit a sin steeped in hate...
...to ensure I'll never give up.
...Even so, I stared and stared@at that scene as if I were searing@every bit of it into my eyes.
And I decided...I'm going to live.
"Farewell, Hanna."
